'''''Mallorn'' 9''' is the ninth issue of the Tolkien Society's journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in [[1975]].

==Contents==

* '''Editorial'''
** Editorial
*** By: [[Jonathan Simons|Jon S. Simons]]
* '''Notes'''
** The Elven Hymn to Elbereth
*** By: Neil McLeod
** Two Letters to the Society
*** By: [[Michael Tolkien]]
** The Geology of Middle Earth
*** By: Roger Mason
** Tolkien's Walk
*** By: [[Norman Power|Canon Norman Power]]
** [[Letter to Norman Power]]
*** By: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
** The Mystic Initiations of Gandalf
*** Author unknown
** A Marxist Looks at Middle Earth, or, the Political Economy of the Shire
*** Author unknown
** A Note on the Population and Settlement of Bree
*** By: Edward Crawford
** The Men of Bree-Land
*** By: Terry Jones
* '''Creative'''
** Grand Competition (crossword puzzle) Result
*** By: Janet K. Gibbs
** The Lament of Legolas (Lir Legolas)
*** By: Neil MacLeod
** The Song of Oscar
*** By: Anne of Briar Ditch (Anne Etkin)
** Ballade of a Vain Regret
*** By: Anne of Briar Ditch (Anne Etkin)
** Tolkien Alphabet
*** By: Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]])
** A Dwarf Wives' Tale
*** By: Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]])
